content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs my computer, I received an error when I executed the command "list_files" with the argument "limit_output" set to true. As a result, I was advised not to execute it again with the same arguments. To limit the output, I sent a new command with the argument "limit_output" set to true. As you, I sent a command to execute_shell with the command line "ls | head -n 5" to limit the output. Command execute_shell returned a list of file names and an atlas settings file. I then sent a command to read the file "martial_arts_info.txt".'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command read_file returned: The text discusses various types of martial arts, including traditional and contemporary styles, armed and unarmed techniques, and those focusing on strikes, grappling, or both. Examples of specific martial arts mentioned include karate, judo, taekwondo, boxing, wrestling, fencing, Chinese wushu, kickboxing, Brazilian jiu-jitsu, aikido, and mixed martial arts (MMA). The text also notes the use of martial arts in self-defense, military, and law enforcement applications, as well as the health and fitness benefits of training. However, the text does not provide a comprehensive list of all types of martial arts.'}]
"""
